channel.title: CVE Feed for Nextcloud -- com.nextcloud.client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nextcloud -- com.nextcloud.client

item.title: CVE-2019-5455|2024-08-04T19:54:53.490Z -- nextcloud -- com.nextcloud.client
item.description: Bypassing lock protection exists in Nextcloud Android app 3.6.0 when creating a multi-account and aborting the process.

item.title: CVE-2019-5453|2024-08-04T19:54:53.548Z -- nextcloud -- com.nextcloud.client
item.description: Bypass lock protection in the Nextcloud Android app prior to version 3.3.0 allowed access to files when being prompted for the lock protection and switching to the Nextcloud file provider.
